summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; making an appropriation from the Arterial City Street Fund for the improvement of Mt. Rainier Ave. S. from S. Hanford St. North to 37th Place S. and S. Ridge Way Place; authorizing the hiring of expert and consultant services; and awarding of a contract or contracts; and increasing the expenditure allowance in the 1979 Budget of the Engineering Department.
